titleStmt.title: A sober vvarning to people that they may regard the work of the Lord. The 28th day of the 7th month, 1696
titleStmt.author: Laythes, Thomas, d. 1701.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed and sold by T. Sowle, in White-Hart-Court in Gracious-street,
